[x]Give all enemy minions

Put a copy of

HUNTER.name: Unleash the Beasts

HUNTER.name: Second Class: Hunter

HUNTER.name: The Marsh Queen

HUNTER.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Deal $1 damage.

Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.

HUNTER.flavor: Han shot first.

HUNTER.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Depths, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.

HUNTER.name: Feign Death
HUNTER.text: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.

HUNTER.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

HUNTER.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.

HUNTER.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.

HUNTER.name: Hidden Cache
HUNTER.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.

HUNTER.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?
HUNTER.name: Snake Trap
HUNTER.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.

HUNTER.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...
HUNTER.name: Grievous Bite
HUNTER.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.

HUNTER.flavor: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!
HUNTER.howToEarn: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
HUNTER.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

HUNTER.text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal $5 damage to a random enemy.

HUNTER.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

HUNTER.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.

HUNTER.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.
HUNTER.name: Snipe
HUNTER.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.

HUNTER.flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.
HUNTER.name: Venomstrike Trap
HUNTER.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.

HUNTER.flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.
HUNTER.howToEarn: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
HUNTER.howToEarnGolden: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.
HUNTER.name: Explorer's Hat
HUNTER.text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."

HUNTER.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.
HUNTER.name: Bear Trap
HUNTER.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.

HUNTER.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!
HUNTER.name: Explosive Trap
HUNTER.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.

HUNTER.flavor: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."
HUNTER.howToEarn: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
HUNTER.howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

HUNTER.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.

HUNTER.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!
HUNTER.name: Flare
HUNTER.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.

HUNTER.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

HUNTER.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."

HUNTER.flavor: pow POW pow
HUNTER.name: Powershot
HUNTER.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.

HUNTER.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

HUNTER.text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.

HUNTER.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

HUNTER.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

HUNTER.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

HUNTER.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

HUNTER.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.

HUNTER.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

HUNTER.flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

HUNTER.flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

DREAM.name: Nightmare
